0.1.name: wordpress/history-timeline
0.1.description: Plugin for displaying an history timeline based on tags, now it support Before Christ dates. Choose an input date format for discriminate the tags for build the timeline, for each tag this plugin extract a random post from all related posts. You can also choose the output format of the date and the timeline order. The css is customizable from the admin area of the plugin. Compatible with qtranslate
